title: Strategies for Improving University Mathematics Education Using Real-Time Online Voting

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online educational tools and understanding of college-level math curriculum
context.additional_context: Enhancing Capabilities in Designing and Executing Math Lessons Using Real-Time Online Polling Tools (Mentimeter, Slido, etc.) for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose learner comprehension at over 80% during math classes using real-time online polling tools
Learners can establish three or more lesson improvement plans based on polling data by applying action research methodology
Learners can design ten or more real-time polling questions suitable for math education contexts (concept verification, problem-solving process tracking, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
